text_en: The Jaws program needs a well facilitated computer.
Jaws aids PWVI to get to know what is written by voice.
Jaws is not only for knowing what is written, but in case if the PWVI want to read a document.
It is that program that assist PWVI how to get it or how to read it for herself/himself without consulting any other person to come and help the PWVI.
A sighted person can check if it is possible to read the result of the work using a screen.
